events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's message indicates a refund request due to receiving an incorrect product.
Assigning case to refunds department specialist for handling the refund request.
Hello, thank you for contacting us. I'm here to assist you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and any photos of the item you received?
Sure, my order number is 123456789, and I've attached pictures showing the incorrect product I got.
Thank you for the details. I have initiated your refund. You will receive the money back within 5 business days.
Thanks for the quick response. I appreciate your help in resolving this so fast.
The refund has been processed and the case is now resolved to your satisfaction.
We wanted to check in and confirm that you received your refund as expected and if you need any further assistance.
Closing the case now as the refund has been confirmed and no further actions are required.
A customer satisfaction survey invitation has been sent to gather feedback on the support experience.
